The Sad Onion.name: The Sad Onion
description: +0.7 Tears Up

The Inner Eye.name: The Inner Eye
description: Tears now shoot three at a time (Triple Shot)
Tears Down significantly (tears = tears * 2.1 + 3).

Spoon Bender.name: Spoon Bender
description: Gives Isaac's tears a homing effect.

Cricket's Head.name: Cricket's Head
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Gold Chest
description: +0.5 Damage Up
+50% / 1.5 times Damage Multiplier (Does not stack with the Magic Mushroom multiplier).
Tears now have a significant knockback effect (Does not increase the shot speed stat).
Can be found in golden chests.
Cricket's Head used to be known as 'Max's Head in the original game and was renamed for Rebirth.

My Reflection.name: My Reflection
description: Gives tears a boomerang effect.
+1.5 Range Up.
+0.6 Shot Speed Up.
+1 Tear Height.

Number One.name: Number One
description: Gives you a very high tear rate in exchange for a big range down.
+1.5 Tears Up.
-15.78 Range Down.
+0.45 Tear Height.

Blood of the Martyr.name: Blood of the Martyr
description: +1.0 Damage Up.

+50% / 1.5 times Damage Multiplier if you also have Book of
Belial (Does not stack with Magic Mushroom or Cricket's Head
multipliers)
This item can only be found in the item room pool, unlike the original game where it was also a god item

Brother Bobby.name: Brother Bobby
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
description: A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots normal tears which do 3.5 damage.
Brother Bobby fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.

Skatole.name: Skatole
meta: Item Pool: None (Arcade shell game only)
description: All fly enemies are no longer aggressive towards Isaac.
Is only available from the shell game in the arcade.
Can be won from the arcade skull game.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.

Halo of Flies.name: Halo of Flies
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Key Beggar
description: Gives Isaac 2 orbital flies which block enemy shots.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.

1UP.name: 1UP
description: Gives the player an extra life

When revived, the green mushroom that follows Isaac will
disappear and he will respawn with the same amount of red heart
containers at full health.
Resurrection takes place before all other items which give you an extra live, except Guppy's Collar.

Magic Mushroom.name: Magic Mushroom
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Boss Room, Mushrooms
description: +1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.

+50% / 1.5 times Damage Multiplier (Does not stack with the
multipliers from Cricket's Head / Blood of The Martyr + Book of Belial).
+5.25 Range Up.
+0.3 Speed Up.
+0.5 Tear Height.
Increases the size of your player sprite, but doesn't increase the hitbox.
Similar to the original game, the Magic Mushroom does not give a tears up despite saying 'All Stats Up'.
Fully restores all red heart containers.
Can be dropped when exploding mushrooms in the Caves/Catacombs.

The Virus.name: The Virus
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Demon Beggar, Lust Miniboss
description: Deals poison damage on contact with enemies (Damage over time 4 or 6 per tick).
-0.1 Speed Down. (Cached: Only applied after the speed stat is next updated)
Has a chance to drop from the Lust miniboss fight.

Roid Rage.name: Roid Rage
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Boss Room, Demon Beggar
description: +0.6 Speed Up.
+5.25 Range Up.
+0.5 Shot Height.

meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Boss Room, Gluttony Miniboss
description: +1 Health Up
Fully restores all red heart containers
Has a chance to drop from the Gluttony miniboss fight.

Raw Liver.name: Raw Liver
description: +2 Health Up.
Full red heart heal.

Skeleton Key.name: Skeleton Key
description: +99 Keys

A Dollar.name: A Dollar
description: +99 coins.
Can drop from an exploding slot machine while playing it.

Boom!.name: Boom!
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Bomb Beggar
description: +10 Bombs

Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 3 times.
description: Gives Isaac the ability to fly.

The Compass.name: The Compass
description: Shows all icons on the map (e.g. Shop)
Does not show the layout of the map.
Room icons will not show if a Curse of the Lost is in effect on the current floor.

Lunch.name: Lunch
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Challenge Room, Beggar
description: +1 Health Up.

Dinner.name: Dinner
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Beggar, Challenge Room
description: +1 Health Up.

Dessert.name: Dessert
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Beggar, Challenge Room
description: +1 Health Up.

Breakfast.name: Breakfast
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Challenge Room, Beggar
description: +1 Health Up.

Rotten Meat.name: Rotten Meat
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Beggar, Challenge Room
description: +1 Health Up

Wooden Spoon.name: Wooden Spoon
description: +0.3 Speed Up.

The Belt.name: The Belt
description: +0.3 Speed Up.

Mom's Underwear.name: Mom's Underwear
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Challenge Room
description: +5.25 Range Up
+0.5 Tear Height.

Mom's Heels.name: Mom's Heels
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Challenge Room
description: +5.25 Range Up
+0.5 Tear Height.

Mom's Lipstick.name: Mom's Lipstick
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Challenge Room
description: +5.25 Range Up
+0.5 Tear Height.

Wire Coat Hanger.name: Wire Coat Hanger
Wire Coat Hanger.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 4 times.
description: +0.7 Tears Up.

The Bible.name: The Bible
meta: Item Pool: Shop, Library, Angel Room
description: Gives Isaac angel wings for the current room, allowing him to fly.
If used during the Mom's Foot or Mom's Heart boss fights, The Bible will kill Mom instantly.
If used during the Satan fight, The Bible will instantly kill Isaac.

The Book of Belial.name: The Book of Belial
description: Upon use, gives +2 damage up which lasts for the current room.

+50% / 1.5 times Damage Multiplier if you also have Blood of
the Martyr (Does not stack with Magic Mushroom or Cricket's Head
multipliers).
Guaranteed Devil or Angel Room if you have it when you kill the boss on all floors where it's possible to get one.
Judas starts with this item.

The Necronomicon.name: The Necronomicon
meta: Item Pool: Library, Secret Room, Devil Room
The Necronomicon.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by using 4 Death Cards.
description: Deals 40 damage to everything in the room when used.

The Poop.name: The Poop
description: Drops a poop on the floor.
Blue Baby starts with this item.
Can be placed next to a pit and exploded to make a bridge.
Can be placed over a broken red poop to overwrite it, causing it to no longer regenerate.

Mr. Boom.name: Mr. Boom
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Wrath Miniboss, Bomb Beggar
description: Drops a large bomb below the player which does 110 damage.
Has a chance to drop from the Wrath miniboss fight.

Tammy's Head.name: Tammy's Head
description: Fires 10 tears in a circle around Isaac.
Each tear is equal to your damage stat + 25 flat damage.
The tears spawned from Tammy's Head retain tear effects of Isaac's tears, such as poison or homing.
Synergizes extremely well with Brimstone due to how the damage from both items is calculated when combined.

Mom's Bra.name: Mom's Bra
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Challenge Room
description: When used, freezes all enemies in the current room temporarily.

Kamikaze.name: Kamikaze
description: Causes an explosion near the player which takes away half a heart and does 40 damage all enemies in close proximity.

Mom's Pad.name: Mom's Pad
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Challenge Room
description: When used, causes all enemies in the current room to run away from Isaac in fear for a few seconds.

Bob's Rotten Head.name: Bob's Rotten Head
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Gold Chest, Sloth Miniboss
description: A poison bomb which can be thrown and leaves a poison effect on any enemies within the blast radius.
The bomb deals 50 damage on hit and leaves a damage over time poison effect that does 6 or 8 damage per tick.
Synergizes with tear modifying items such as My Reflection or Tiny Planet.
Has a chance to drop from the Sloth miniboss fight.

Teleport.name: Teleport
description: Teleports Isaac to a random location on the map.

Yum Heart.name: Yum Heart
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Super Lust Miniboss
description: Heals Isaac for one whole red heart.
Maggy starts with this item.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Lust miniboss fight.

Lucky Foot.name: Lucky Foot
description: +1.0 Luck Up.
Better chance to win while gambling.
Does not make all pills positive or neutral like the original game.

Doctor's Remote.name: Doctor's Remote
description:
A target is placed on the floor which can be controlled. After a
 few seconds a huge missile hits the target and deals 70 damage to
anything nearby.
The damage dealt from this item scales with your damage stat.
Essentially a one-time more powerful use of the Epic Fetus item.

Cupid's Arrow.name: Cupid's Arrow
description: Isaac's tears now have a piercing effect which allows them to travel through enemies whilst damaging them.

Shoop Da Whoop!.name: Shoop Da Whoop!
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Envy Miniboss, Super Envy Miniboss
description: When used, fires a high damage laser in a straight line across the room in a similar way to Brimstone.

The laser deals damage equal to your tear damage * 4, at 7
ticks per laser, meaning the maximum potential damage per laser is your
tear damage * 28.
Has a chance to drop from the Envy and Super Envy miniboss fights.

Steven.name: Steven
Steven.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Basement 40 times and defeating the Steven boss.
description: +1 Damage Up.
Has a small chance to drop from the Steven boss fight.

Pentagram.name: Pentagram
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Curse Room, Devil Room
description: +1.0 Damage Up.
Higher chance of a Devil Deal opening after the boss fight (Approximately +20% through testing).

Dr. Fetus.name: Dr. Fetus
Dr. Fetus.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 9 times.
description: Instead of tears, Isaac now shoots bombs from his eyes, which explode dealing damage to anything nearby.
Bomb damage = damage * 5 + 30.
Tears Down (Tear delay * 2.5).
Bombs will also synergize with other bomb items and tear modifiers, including Sad Bombs, Mr. Mega and many more.

Magneto.name: Magneto
description: Causes pickups on the floor move towards the player.

Treasure Map.name: Treasure Map
description: Reveals the entire map for every floor not including both secret room locations.
Does not show the icons for any unknown rooms.

Can still help you to guess which direction the boss room is in,
due to the fact that the Boss Room is usually in the room furthest away
from the first room.

Mom's Eye.name: Mom's Eye
Mom's Eye.pickup: "Eye in the back of your head"
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Challenge Room
description: Isaac has a random chance to fire another tear out the back of his head.
The chance to fire the second tear can improve based on your luck stat and will always activate at +2 Luck.

Synergizes very well with a lot of items. If used with
Brimstone you have a 100% chance to fire a laser out the back of your
head.

Lemon Mishap.name: Lemon Mishap
description:
When used, drops a pool of 'lemonade' on the floor which
damages any enemies that come into contact with it for 8 damage per
tick.

Distant Admiration.name: Distant Admiration
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Key Beggar
description: Gives Isaac an orbiting fly which deals 5 contact damage to enemies per tick.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.

Book of Shadows.name: Book of Shadows
description: Gives the player an invulnerability effect which lasts for a few seconds.

The Ladder.name: The Ladder
description: Allows Isaac to walk over gaps with a width of one tile.

Charm of the Vampire.name: Charm of the Vampire
description: Heals half a heart after every 13 enemies killed.

The Battery.name: The Battery
description: All spacebar items can now be 'overcharged', allowing them to be charged up twice instead of once.
The extra charges appear in yellow on top of the normal green bars.
Has no effect with items which recharge over time instead of on a per-room basis.

Steam Sale.name: Steam Sale
meta: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Miniboss, Shopkeeper
description: Items in the shop are now -50% off, rounded down to the nearest whole number.
Has a chance to drop from the Greed miniboss fight or when bombing the shopkeeper.
This item is called Steamy Sale on PS4, PS Vita, Xbox One and Switch versions, probably due to copyright reasons.

Anarchist's Cookbook.name: Anarchist's Cookbook
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Library, Pride Miniboss
description: Spawns troll bombs at random locations around the room.
Bombs are effected by other passive bomb items.
Has a chance to drop from the Pride miniboss fight.

The Hourglass.name: The Hourglass
description: When used, slows down all enemies in the current room and their projectiles for a short period of time.

Sister Maggy.name: Sister Maggy
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
description: A familiar which follows Isaac around and shoots blood tears that deal 3.5 damage.
The tears appear red but have no additional damage.
Sister Maggy fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.

Technology.name: Technology
description: Isaac's tears are replaced with a laser that has unlimited range and can only fire at right angles.
Lasers travel through enemies but not obstacles in the room.

Chocolate Milk.name: Chocolate Milk
description: Isaac can now charge shots for more damage by holding down the fire button.
At full charge, your tears do 4 times more damage.
Tears fired at the minimum possible charge do roughly 1/3 of your normal damage.
Tears up - Spamming the fire button allows for rapid fire shots at normal damage.

Growth Hormones.name: Growth Hormones
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Demon Beggar
description: +1.0 Damage Up
+0.4 Speed Up

Mini Mush.name: Mini Mush
description: +0.3 Speed Up
Decreases range stat by -4.25 but increases your tear height by 1.5, increasing your actual tear range.
Causes Isaac to shrink in size (including hitbox slightly).
Can be dropped when exploding mushrooms in the environment that are usually found in the Caves/Catacombs and in secret rooms.

Rosary.name: Rosary
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
description: +3 Soul Hearts.
Adds several instances of The Bible item into the Boss Room, Shop, Beggar, Secret Room, Gold Chest and Devil Pools.

Cube of Meat.name: Cube of Meat
Cube of Meat.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Mom for the first time.
description: An orbital which blocks shots and damages enemies it comes into contact with for 7 damage per tick.
Exclusively drops from one of the horsemen bosses.
2 cubes of meat transform the orbital into a meat head which fires blood tears which deal 3.5 damage each.
3 cubes of meat transform it into a meat boy familiar that walks around and deals 3.5 contact damage per tick to enemies.
4 cubes of meat cause the meat boy familiar to grow in size and do 5.5 damage per tick instead.
Any further cubes of meat past 4 will start the cycle again.

A Quarter.name: A Quarter
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room, Super Greed Miniboss
A Quarter.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 8 times.
description: +25 Coins
Has a very small chance to drop after destroying one of the pots that appear in the Basement and Cellar floors.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Greed miniboss fight.

PhD.name: PhD
description: All pills now have a positive or neutral effect.
Pills are identified before using them.
Drops one pill on pickup.
Heals for 2 full red hearts.

X-Ray Vision.name: X-Ray Vision
description: Reveals the entrance to secret rooms and automatically opens the hole, removing the need for bombs to enter.

My Little Unicorn.name: My Little Unicorn
description: Gives Isaac temporary invincibility and allows him to do 40 contact damage to enemies per hit.

Book of Revelations.name: Book of Revelations
Book of Revelations.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating one of the horsemen bosses for the first time.
description: Upon use, gives Isaac an extra Soul heart.
Using this item gives you a higher chance of finding a horsemen boss at the end of the floor.
+25% chance of a Devil Deal opening after the boss fight

The Mark.name: The Mark
meta: Item Pool: Curse Room, Devil Room
description: +1.0 Damage Up.
+0.2 Speed Up.
+1 Soul Heart.

The Pact.name: The Pact
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room
description: +0.5 Damage Up.
+0.7 Tears Up.
+2 Soul Hearts.

Dead Cat.name: Dead Cat
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest, Super Pride Miniboss
description: Isaac's health is set to 1 and he also gains 9 extra lives.
Each time Isaac dies, he will respawn with 1 Health.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Pride mini boss.
The floating Dead Cat head that follows you will disappear when you are on your last life (Very useful for The Lost)
This is one of the items which allows you to transform into Guppy.

Lord of the Pit.name: Lord of the Pit
description: Gives Isaac demon wings and the ability to fly.
+0.3 Speed Up (Only applied after the speed stat is next updated).

The Nail.name: The Nail
The Nail.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Boss Rush with Azazel.
description: +0.7 Damage Up.
-0.18 Speed Down.
+1 Soul Heart
Gives you the ability to crush rocks by walking over them.
Allows Isaac to deal contact damage to enemies for the current room. Does not prevent Isaac from taking contact damage.
All the above effects are only active when the item is used for the current room.

We Need To Go Deeper.name: We Need To Go Deeper
meta: Item Pool: Secret Room, Devil Room
description: Spawns a trapdoor at Isaac's feet which allows him to travel to the next floor.
The trapdoor has a 10% chance to become a Black Market.
Has no effect in Sheol, Cathedral, Chest and Dark Room.
Cannot spawn a trapdoor directly infront of a secret room entrance.
Can destroy rocks if used when Isaac is flying over a rock.

Deck of Cards.name: Deck of Cards
description: Gives Isaac a random tarot card on use.

Monstro's Tooth.name: Monstro's Tooth
Monstro's Tooth.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Basement II for the first time.
description: When used, spawns a Monstro which will jump on a random enemy in the room, dealing 120 damage.

Loki's Horns.name: Loki's Horns
Loki's Horns.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Lokii for the first time.
description: Everytime you fire a tear, there is a chance that you will also fire three more tears in all cardinal directions.
The chance to fire 4-way tears is affected by your luck stat and at +7 Luck it will activate every time.

Little Chubby.name: Little Chubby
Little Chubby.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Caves II for the first time.
description: A familiar that follows Isaac and charges forwards, dealing 3.5 damage per tick to any enemies it comes into contact with.

Spider Bite.name: Spider Bite
description: Tears now have a chance of slowing enemies and their projectiles for 2.5 seconds.
The chance to slow enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +15 Luck it will activate every time.

The Small Rock.name: The Small Rock
The Small Rock.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by destroying 100 tinted rocks.
description: +1.0 Damage Up.
+0.2 Tears Up. (Only applied after the tears stat is next updated)
-0.2 Speed Down. (Only applied after the speed stat is next updated)
Has a chance to drop when exploding a tinted rock.

Spelunker Hat.name: Spelunker Hat
description: Reveals the location of the Secret Room and Super Secret Room when you are in a room directly next to them.

Super Bandage.name: Super Bandage
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Boss Room, pink, plaster, sticker
Super Bandage.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by making a Super Bandage Girl.
description: +1 Health Up.
+2 Soul Hearts

The Gamekid.name: The Gamekid
The Gamekid.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by visiting 10 arcades.
description: When used Isaac transforms into pacman, which makes him invincible and does 40 contact damage to enemies per chomp.
Everytime you 'eat' an enemy, you regain some health.

Sack of Pennies.name: Sack of Pennies
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room
Sack of Pennies.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Isaac with Cain.
description: A bag that floats around following Isaac and drops a random coin every 2 rooms.

Robo-Baby.name: Robo-Baby
description: A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots lasers, similar to the Technology item.
Robo-Baby's laser is spectral and piercing (It will pass through rocks and objects in the environment)
Robo-Baby's lasers deal 3.5 damage per hit.

Little C.H.A.D..name: Little C.H.A.D.
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, C.H.A.D. Boss
Little C.H.A.D..unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Caves 30 times and defeating C.H.A.D.
description: A familiar which follows Isaac and drops half a red heart every 3 rooms.

The Book of Sin.name: The Book of Sin
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Library, Devil Room
The Book of Sin.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating each of the Seven Sins once.
description: Spawns a random pickup on the floor.
The possible pickups from this item include: Bombs, hearts, keys, coins, pills, batteries or tarot cards.

The Relic.name: The Relic
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
The Relic.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Maggy.
description: A blue cross that follows Isaac and drops a soul heart every 4 rooms.

Little Gish.name: Little Gish
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Gish Boss
Little Gish.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Depths 20 times and killing the Gish boss.
description: A familiar that follows Isaac and fires black tar tears, which slow enemy movement and projectile speed for a few seconds.
Little Gish's tears do 3.5 damage.
Little Gish fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.
A Guaranteed drop from the Gish boss fight.

Little Steven.name: Little Steven
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Steven Boss
Little Steven.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by killing the Steven boss for the first time.
description: A familiar that follows Isaac and fires homing tears that deal 3.5 damage each.
Has a high chance to drop from the Steven boss fight.
Little Steven fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second with a slightly longer range than other familiars.

The Halo.name: The Halo
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Boss Room, Angel Room
The Halo.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by killing Mom (Mom's Foot or Mom's Heart) using The Bible.
description: +1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.
+0.2 Tears Up.
+0.25 Range Up.
+0.3 Speed Up.
+0.5 Tear Height.

Mom's Bottle of Pills.name: Mom's Bottle of Pills
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Shop, Challenge Room, Beggar, Demon Beggar
description: When used, gives Isaac a random pill.

The Common Cold.name: The Common Cold
description: Tears now have a random chance to apply a poison effect, causing damage to enemies over time.
The chance to fire poison shots is affected by your luck stat and at +12 Luck it will activate every time.
Gives a big increase in damage to Dr. Fetus bombs.

The Parasite.name: The Parasite
The Parasite.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by collecting two of the following items: Bob's Rotten Head, Dead Cat, Cricket's Head, Tammy's Head.
description: Isaac's tears now split into two upon contact with enemies or the environment.
Tears that split off from the main tear do less damage (tear damage * 0.25).

The D6.name: The D6
The D6.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by defeating the Isaac boss with Blue Baby.
description: Upon use, any pedestal item (e.g. an item room item) will be re-rolled into another item.
Isaac starts with this item after it is unlocked.

Mr. Mega.name: Mr. Mega
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room, Super Wrath Miniboss
Mr. Mega.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by destroying 10 tinted rocks.
description: +5 Bombs
Bombs now do 110 damage (+60, up from 50) and have a larger blast radius.
Can be found in the secret room.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Wrath miniboss fight.

Pinking Shears.name: Pinking Shears
description:
Cuts Isaac's head from his body for the current room, allowing
him to fly and leaving the decapitated body to run around attacking
enemies for 5.5 damage per tick.

The Wafer.name: The Wafer
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
description: All damage taken is reduced to half a heart.
Damaged reduction is reduced from every source in the game except Devil Deals and health down pills.
Does not prevent death (i.e. Suicide King or using The Bible on Isaac, ??? or Satan).
The Wafer becomes most effective in the Womb and beyond where enemies all deal a whole heart of damage.
The Wafer causes the Sharp Plug item to only cost 1/2 a heart per use.

Money = Power.name: Money = Power
description: +0.04 Damage Up for every coin you currently have.
At 99 coins this item gives +3.96 Damage Up.

+0.04 per coin is the amount added before the damage formula is calculated,
 as this is the only way to show a consistent amount of damage given.
You may see more or less than this on the Found HUD overlay, however
this number varies based on your other damage increasing items

Mom's Contacts.name: Mom's Contacts
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Challenge Room
Mom's Contacts.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by collecting 3 'Mom' items in one playthrough.
description: Tears now have a random chance to freeze enemies in place.
The chance to freeze enemies is affected by your luck stat.
+0.25 Range Up. (Only applied after the range stat is next updated)
+0.5 Tear Height. (Only applied after the height stat is next updated)

The Bean.name: The Bean
description: Upon use, this item causes Isaac to fart and poison any enemies in close proximity.
The Bean deals 26 damage total (5 initially then 21 in a Damage over Time effect.

Guardian Angel.name: Guardian Angel
Guardian Angel.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Maggy.
description: An orbital which does 7 contact damage per tick, blocks shots and increases the speed of all other orbitals.

Demon Baby.name: Demon Baby
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
Demon Baby.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Azazel.
description: A familiar which follows Isaac and automatically fires tears that deal 3 damage each at any enemies in close range.

Mom's Knife.name: Mom's Knife
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room, Challenge Room
Mom's Knife.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Isaac.
description: Tears are replaced with a knife which can be charged and thrown in a boomerang style action.
The knife can also do damage without being thrown as a close range melee weapon.
When used as a melee weapon, Mom's Knife deals your tear damage * 2 per tick.

Ouija Board.name: Ouija Board
description: Gives Isaac spectral tears which allows them to travel through objects in the environment (i.e. rocks).

9 Volt.name: 9 Volt
description: Automatically gives you 1 bar of charge after using your spacebar item.
Fully recharges your current spacebar item when picked up.
Causes the Sharp Plug item to become useless due to the fact that you can never have 0 charge on your spacebar item.
Any items which are normally a 1 room recharge are now timed instead.

Dead Bird.name: Dead Bird
description: When Isaac takes damage, the dead bird will spawn and attack nearby enemies in the current room for 2 damage per tick.
Eve starts with this item.

Brimstone.name: Brimstone
description:
Tears are replaced with the ability to charge and fire a
powerful laser that travels in a straight line across the room, dealing a
 lot of damage (damage * 13) to any enemies it comes into contact with.
Does not directly affect your Damage stat but hits enemies 13 times per charge, spawning Guppy flies with every hit.

Synergizes very well with a lot of items including Tammy's
Head, Tiny Planet, Inner Eye (Triple Shot), Mutant Spider (Quad Shot)
and many others.
An item only found in the devil room pool (Note: The Fallen boss pulls items from the Devil Room Pool)

Blood Bag.name: Blood Bag
meta: Item Pool: None (Blood Donation machine only)
Blood Bag.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by playing the Blood Donation machine 30 times.
description: +1 Health Up
+0.3 Speed Up
Heals for 5 full red hearts.
Has a chance to drop while playing any Blood Donation machine.

Odd Mushroom (Thin).name: Odd Mushroom (Thin)
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room, brown, purple, grey, gray
description: Gives you a high rate of fire in exchange for a damage down.
+1.7 Tears Up.
+0.3 Speed Up.
Damage Down (damage * 0.9 - 0.4).

Odd Mushroom (Thick).name: Odd Mushroom (Thick)
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room
description: +1 Health Up (The given heart container is empty)
+0.3 Damage Up.
+0.25 Range Up.
-0.1 Speed Down.
+0.5 Tear Height.

Whore of Babylon.name: Whore of Babylon
description: When you only have half a heart remaining or less, you enter a curse state which adds +1.5 damage and +0.3 speed.

When playing as Eve, this item activates with one FULL heart
remaining or less AND also removes her 0.75 damage multiplier, raising
it up to 1.0.
The effect is permanently active for characters with no red hearts (e.g. Blue Baby, The Lost).
One of Eve's starting items.

Monster Manual.name: Monster Manual
description: When used, gives a random familiar for the rest of the room.

Dead Sea Scrolls.name: Dead Sea Scrolls
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
description: Upon use, the dead sea scrolls gives a random spacebar item effect.
An item that can be found in the Angel room.

Bobby - Bomb.name: Bobby - Bomb
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Bomb Beggar
description: All of Isaac's bombs now having a homing effect when placed on the floor.
+5 Bombs.

Razor Blade.name: Razor Blade
Razor Blade.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Eve.
description: When used, deals damage to Isaac in exchange for +1.2 damage up which lasts for the current room.

Forget Me Now.name: Forget Me Now
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room
Forget Me Now.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Blue Baby.
description: Upon use, this item refreshes the current floor with brand new rooms, monsters and items.

Forever Alone.name: Forever Alone
description: An orbiting fly which deals 2 contact damage per tick to enemies.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.

Bucket of Lard.name: Bucket of Lard
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Super Gluttony Miniboss
description: +2 Health Up.
-0.2 Speed Down.
Of the two heart containers given from this item, only 1/2 a red heart of them is filled.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Gluttony miniboss fight.

A Pony.name: A Pony
description: Allows Isaac to fly while the Pony is held.
Sets your speed stat to 1.5 if it isn't already that high.
When the active attack is used, Isaac will dash across the screen dealing 40 contact damage to anything he hits.
Drops from the Headless Horseman boss fight.

Bomb Bag.name: Bomb Bag
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room, Bomb Beggar
Bomb Bag.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Cain.
description: A bag of bombs that will drop a bomb pickup every 2 rooms.

A Lump of Coal.name: A Lump of Coal
description: Tears gain a damage up and increase in size based on the distance they travel.
The length of a normal room roughly gives +6 damage, but this can be higher with double rooms or Tiny Planet.

Guppy's Paw.name: Guppy's Paw
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest
description: When used, removes one heart container and gives you 3 soul hearts.
This is one of the items which allows you to transform into Guppy.

Guppy's Tail.name: Guppy's Tail
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest
description:
When picked up, greatly increases your chance of finding chests
 at the end of a room, while also reducing your chance to find
consumables such as keys and bombs.
This is one of the items which allows you to transform into Guppy.

IV Bag.name: IV Bag
meta: Item Pool: None (Blood donation machine only)
description: Upon use, the IV Bag takes half a red heart and spawns some coins (the same effect as a blood donation machine)
Can drop from a blood donation machine after playing it.

Best Friend.name: Best Friend
description: Places a decoy on the floor which attracts enemies and explodes after a period of time.
When it explodes, it deals 110 damage to everything in radius (Same damage as Mr Mega bombs).

Remote Detonator.name: Remote Detonator
description: +5 Bombs.
Bombs no longer automatically explode and will only do so when you activate the remote detonator.
Can be used to detonate Dr. Fetus bombs early.

Stigmata.name: Stigmata
description: +1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.

Mom's Purse.name: Mom's Purse
description: Isaac can now hold two trinkets at the same time
Allows you to pick up more trinkets while also holding The Tick

Bob's Curse.name: Bob's Curse
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Super Sloth Miniboss, Bomb Beggar
description: All of Isaac's bombs now leave a poison effect on any enemies within the blast radius.
+5 Bombs.

As well as dealing the standard 60 damage for a bomb, it will
apply a Damage over Time effect that does 4 or 6 damage per tick.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Sloth miniboss fight.

Pageant Boy.name: Pageant Boy
description: Spawns 7 random coins around Isaac on the floor.
Isaac wears a pink crown on his head.

Scapular.name: Scapular
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
description: Once per room when you are damaged down to half a heart, you gain 1 soul heart.

Speed Ball.name: Speed Ball
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Boss Room, Demon Beggar
description: +0.3 Speed Up.
+0.2 Shot Speed Up.

Bum Friend.name: Bum Friend
description:
A beggar who follows Isaac around and automatically picks up
nearby coins. After picking up a coin he has a random chance to drop
pickups, including hearts, keys, bombs, coins, pills, cards or trinkets.

Guppy's Head.name: Guppy's Head
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest, Gold Chest
description: When used, spawns between 2-4 blue flies.
This is one of the items which allows you to transform into Guppy.
Blue Flies do 2.0x of Isaac's damage.

Prayer Card.name: Prayer Card
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
description: Gives Isaac an eternal heart when used.
Taking an eternal heart to the next floor or collecting two on the same floor gives you an extra heart container.

Notched Axe.name: Notched Axe
description: Each charge of this item allows Isaac to break all rocks, pots and secret room doors in the current room.
Cannot break the stone blocks which appear in the environment.
If Isaac is damaged while the effect is active, it will deactivate.

Infestation.name: Infestation
description: When Isaac gets hit, a few blue flies will randomly spawn.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
Blue Flies do 2.0x of Isaac's damage.

Ipecac.name: Ipecac
Ipecac.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 6 times.
description:
Isaac's tears are replaced with explosive poison bombs, which
will arc upwards and explode on contact with the floor, dealing huge
damage and leaving a poison effect on enemies in range.
Ipecac shots are given a flat +40 Damage on top of the normal 3.5 base damage.
Tears Down (Tear delay * 2 + 10).
+13.0 Tear Height.
Shots will damage Isaac if he is in the blast radius when they explode.

Tough Love.name: Tough Love
description: Isaac has a random chance to fire a tooth shot instead of a tear sometimes.
Teeth shots deal damage equal to your tear damage * 3.2.
The chance to fire a tooth is affected by your luck stat and at +9 Luck it will activate every time.
Synergizes well with some tear modifiers such as Ipecac, which causes it to do massive damage.

The Mulligan.name: The Mulligan
description: Isaac has a 1/6 chance to spawn a blue fly when one of his tears hits an enemy.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
Blue Flies do 2.0x of Isaac's damage.
The chance to activate this effect is not changed with your Luck stat.

Technology 2.name: Technology 2
description: Isaac now also has a laser with unlimited range which fires continuously and does damage very rapidly.
-35% Damage Down (0.65 damage multiplier).

Mutant Spider.name: Mutant Spider
description: Tears now shoot 4 at a time (Quad Shot)
Tears Down significantly (Tear delay * 2.1 + 3).

Chemical Peel.name: Chemical Peel
description: +2 Damage Up for tears fired from Isaac's left eye.
If you have an item which modifies which eye you fire tears from, each shot has a 50% chance to do +2 Damage.

The Peeper.name: The Peeper
description: Gives Isaac an eye companion that floats around the room and deals 8 damage per tick on contact with enemies.

Habit.name: Habit
description: When you take damage, this item recharges one room's worth of charge to your spacebar item.
For example, with the D6 you would need to take damage 6 times to fully recharge it.

Bloody Lust.name: Bloody Lust
Bloody Lust.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Samson.
description: Each time you take damage, you gain a damage up which lasts for the rest of the floor and turn a darker red colour each time.
After taking 6 hits Bloody Lust doesn't give you any further damage increases.
Damage given for each hit increases as follows: +0.5, +0.5, +0.5, +33%, +33%, +33%.

The maximum effect is (damage + 1.5) * 2, resulting in more than
double your original damage and stacking with other damage increasing
items.

Bloody lust works differently in Rebirth compared to Wrath of
the Lamb - Damage is given for taking damage and is persistent for the
entire floor.

Crystal Ball.name: Crystal Ball
description: Upon use, reveals the entire map and gives the player a random tarot card, mystic rune or soul heart.
Has a chance to drop from playing a fortune machine.

Spirit of the Night.name: Spirit of the Night
description: Gives Isaac the ability to fly and spectral tears.

Crack The Sky.name: Crack The Sky
description:
Creates 5 beams of light from the sky that deal damage equal to
 your tear damage + 20 to any enemies which come into contact with them.
The beams now have improved targetting and will attempt to spawn on top of enemies where possible.

Ankh.name: Ankh
description: Upon death, the player respawns as Blue Baby with three Soul hearts.
This is a one time use item and all new heart containers will be soul hearts.
Can be used to unlock some of Blue Baby's secrets before having the character available.

Celtic Cross.name: Celtic Cross
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
Celtic Cross.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Maggy.
description: Upon taking damage, you have a chance to gain an invulnerability shield for a few seconds.
The chance to gain a shield is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.

Ghost Baby.name: Ghost Baby
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
description: A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots spectral tears that deal 3.5 damage.
Ghost Baby fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.
Can drop while destroying skulls in the Depths and Necropolis floors.

The Candle.name: The Candle
The Candle.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by donating 900 coins to the Shop.
description: A spacebar item which allows Isaac to fire a blue flame that damages anything in its path for 23 damage per tick.
Can cause up to a total of 184 potential damage.

Cat-O-Nine-Tails.name: Cat-O-Nine-Tails
description: +1.0 Damage Up.
+0.23 Shot Speed Up.
An item only found in the Boss room pool.

D20.name: D20
D20.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Isaac.
description: Upon use, re-rolls all pickup consumables in the current room into another random kind of pickup.
This includes hearts, bombs, keys, coins, pills, tarot cards, chests and trinkets.

Harlequin Baby.name: Harlequin Baby
description: A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots two normal tears at once in a V-shaped pattern.
Each of Harlequin Baby's tears deal 4 damage.
Harlequin Baby fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.

Epic Fetus.name: Epic Fetus
Epic Fetus.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #19 (The Family Man).
description: Tears now become missiles which deal huge damage to anything nearby.
Missiles damage = damage * 20.

This item places a controllable red target on the ground which
will cause a missile to fall from the sky and hit it after a short
period of time.

Polyphemus.name: Polyphemus
description: High Damage Up - 2 * (damage + 4).
Tears Down significantly (Tear delay * 2.1 + 3).
If a tear kills an enemy, it continues to travel forward with the leftover damage.

Daddy Longlegs.name: Daddy Longlegs
description: A shadow follows Isaac and stomps on enemies randomly, dealing 40 damage per stomp (2 damage ticks at 20 damage each).

Spider Butt.name: Spider Butt
description: Upon use, does 10 damage to all enemies in the room and gives them a slowing effect.

Sacrificial Dagger.name: Sacrificial Dagger
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
Sacrificial Dagger.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Eve.
description: Gives Isaac an orbital knife that does 15 damage per tick on contact with enemies.
The Sacrificial Dagger DOES block shots in Rebirth, unlike the original game.
Synergises very well with invulnerability items such as Book of Shadows.

Mitre.name: Mitre
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
description: Gives Isaac a much higher chance to find soul hearts

Rainbow Baby.name: Rainbow Baby
description: A familiar the follows Isaac and fires random tears.
Rainbow Baby's tears can choose from any of the other familiars, such as homing, spectral, tar shots etc.

Dad's Key.name: Dad's Key
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Key Beggar
Dad's Key.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by collecting both Key Pieces #1 & #2 for the first time.
description: Upon use, opens all closed doors in the current room, including the ones which require a key to enter and secret room doors.
Can be used to open the golden door that appears in the Dark Room or the Chest.

Stem Cells.name: Stem Cells
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Boss Room
description: +1 Health Up.
+0.16 Shot Speed Up.

Portable Slot.name: Portable Slot
description:
Using the portable slot takes a coin and has a chance to give a
 pickup - Exactly the same as how the normal slot machines work.

Holy Water.name: Holy Water
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room
description:
When Isaac takes damage, the bottle breaks and leaves a pool on
 the floor which deals 8 damage per tick to enemies which walk over it.

Fate.name: Fate
Fate.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Blue Baby.
description: Gives Isaac an eternal heart and the ability to fly.
Taking an eternal heart to the next floor or collecting two on the same floor gives you an extra heart container.

The Black Bean.name: The Black Bean
description: Upon taking damage, Isaac will fart, causing all enemies in close proximity to become poisoned.
Black Bean deals 26 damage total (5 initially then 21 in a Damage over Time effect.

White Pony.name: White Pony
description: Allows Isaac to fly while the White Pony is held.

While held, sets your speed stat to 1.5 if it isn't already that
high. If your speed stat is already higher then that value is still
used.

Upon use, Isaac charges in the direction the pony is facing,
becoming invulnerable during the charge and damaging enemies while also
casting the effect of Crack The Sky.

The charge of the spacebar attack deals 40 damage on contact
with enemies and the beams deal damage equal to your tear damage + 20.
Drops from the Conquest boss fight.

Sacred Heart.name: Sacred Heart
description: Tears are now white, do a lot more damage and move slower across the screen with a homing effect.
Health Up.
Damage Up (damage * 2.3 + 1).
-0.4 Tears Down.
-0.25 Shot Speed Down.
+0.375 Range Up.
+0.75 Tear Height.
Full red heart heal.

Toothpicks.name: Toothpicks
description: +0.7 Tears Up.
+0.16 Shot Speed Up.
Does not increase your damage, simply makes your tears red.

Holy Grail.name: Holy Grail
description: +1 Health Up
Gives Isaac the ability to fly.

Dead Dove.name: Dead Dove
description: Gives Isaac the ability to fly and spectral tears.
An item only found in the Angel room.

Blood Rights.name: Blood Rights
Blood Rights.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Samson.
description: Upon use, takes away one full heart and deals 40 damage to the entire room.
With the Isaac's Heart item, you can use Blood Rights without taking damage.

Guppy's Hairball.name: Guppy's Hairball
Guppy's Hairball.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by collecting 3 Guppy items and transforming into Guppy.
description: Follows behind Isaac and can be swung back and forth, dealing 3 contact damage per tick to anything it hits.
Every time the hairball kills an enemy, it grows in size allowing it to deal more damage.
This is one of the items which allows you to transform into Guppy.

Abel.name: Abel
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Gold Chest
Abel.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Cain.
description: A familiar that mirrors the player's movements and shoots tears directly at Isaac.
Abel's tears do the same as Isaac's base damage (3.5).
In larger rooms, Abel will mirror to the other side of the screen instead of the entire room.

SMB Super Fan.name: SMB Super Fan
SMB Super Fan.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #14 (It's in the Cards).
description: Isaac turns red like Meatboy.
+1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.
+0.2 Tears Up.
+0.5 Range Up.
+0.2 Speed Up.
+1.0 Tear Height.
Full red heart heal.

Pyro.name: Pyro
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room, Bomb Beggar
description: +99 Bombs.

3 Dollar Bill.name: 3 Dollar Bill
description: Random tear effect for every room.

Possible tear effects: Fire Mind, Spoon Bender, My Reflection,
Ouija Board, 20/20, Inner Eye, Iron Bar, Death's Touch, Tough Love,
Proptosis, Number One, Mom's Contacts or Dark Matter.

Telepathy for Dummies.name: Telepathy for Dummies
description: When used, Isaac gains homing shots for the current room.

MEAT!.name: MEAT!
description: +1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.

Magic 8 Ball.name: Magic 8 Ball
description: +0.16 Shot Speed Up.
Gives Isaac a random tarot card when picked up.

Mom's Coin Purse.name: Mom's Coin Purse
meta: Item Pool: Shop, Boss Room, Challenge Room, Beggar, Demon Beggar
description: Drops 4 random pills on the floor around Isaac.

Squeezy.name: Squeezy
description: +2 Soul Hearts.
+0.4 Tears Up.

Jesus Juice.name: Jesus Juice
description: +0.5 Damage Up.
+0.25 Range Up.
+0.5 Tear Height.

Box.name: Box
meta: Item Pool: Boss Room, Challenge Room
description: Spawns one of each type of pickup.
Pickups spawned: 1 heart, 1 key, 1 bomb, 1 coin, 1 card, 1 pill and 1 trinket.

Mom's Key.name: Mom's Key
meta: Item Pool: Shop, Challenge Room, Key Beggar
description: +2 Keys
Higher chance to get more consumable drops from chests.

Mom's Eyeshadow.name: Mom's Eyeshadow
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Challenge Room
description: Tears have a random chance to charm enemies.
Charmed enemies will prioritize attacking other enemies in the room, otherwise they will still attack Isaac.
The chance to charm enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.

Iron Bar.name: Iron Bar
description: +0.3 Damage Up.
Tears now have a chance to concuss enemies, causing them to walk around dazed and confused for a short period of time.
The chance to concuss enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.

Midas Touch.name: Midas Touch
description: Isaac's touch now petrifies enemies, turning them to gold for a few seconds.
If an enemy is killed while it is golden, it will drop between 1-4 coins.
Contact damage is also dealt to enemies equal to the amount of coins Isaac is currently holding.
Has a synergy with The Poop item, which gives it a high chance to spawn golden poops.

Humbling Bundle.name: Humbling Bundle
description: All future pennies, keys, bombs and hearts will drop in pairs.
Does not work for soul hearts, nickels, dimes, cards or pills.

Fanny pack.name: Fanny pack
description: When Isaac is hit, there is a chance he will drop a pickup (i.e. coin, bomb, key)

Sharp plug.name: Sharp plug
description: When your spacebar item is out of charge, you can press spacebar to use it at the cost of 2 health.
This item only costs 1/2 a heart to use if you have The Wafer or the Cancer item.
The Sharp Plug will take health from Soul/Black hearts (if any) before taking red hearts.

The Guillotine.name: The Guillotine
The Guillotine.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Judas.
description: +1.0 Damage Up.
-1 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
Causes Isaac's head to detach and orbit his body, blocking shots and dealing 7 contact damage per tick.
BFFs will cause the Guillotine head to do double damage (14 damage per tick)
Tears are still fired from Isaac's head but the hitbox remains around his body.

Ball of Bandages.name: Ball of Bandages
description: Gives Isaac an orbital ball of bandages that deals 7 contact damage per tick. Unlike the Cube of Meat, it does not block enemy shots.
Collecting a second Ball of Bandages in the run turns the orbital into a pink head that shoots tears that deal 7 damage each and have a chance to charm enemies.
Getting a third Ball of Bandages will transform the head into bandage girl which will chase enemies dealing 3.5 contact damage per tick while firing charm tears.
A fourth Ball of Bandages will make the Bandage Girl bigger and stronger, making her deal 5.5 damage per tick instead.
Any further Ball of Bandages will repeat the cycle.
Charmed enemies will prioritize attacking other enemies in the room, otherwise they will still attack Isaac.

Champion Belt.name: Champion Belt
description: +1.0 Damage Up.
Increases the chance of champion enemies appearing.
An item only found in the Shop room pool.

Butt Bombs.name: Butt Bombs
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Bomb Beggar
description: +5 bombs.
Bombs now become poop bombs, which deal 10 damage to all enemies in the room and daze them for a short period of time.

Gnawed Leaf.name: Gnawed Leaf
description: If Isaac stands still for a second, he turns to stone, making him invincible until he moves again.
This item is a reference to the Tanuki suit in Super Mario 3.

Spiderbaby.name: Spiderbaby
description: Creates friendly attack spiders when Isaac is damaged.

Guppy's Collar.name: Guppy's Collar
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest
description: When Isaac dies, he has a 50% chance to respawn with 1/2 a heart.
This is one of the items which allows you to transform into Guppy.

Lost Contact.name: Lost Contact
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room
description: All of Isaac's tears now have a shield, allowing them to block an enemy projectile.
If a tear blocks something, both Isaac's and the enemies tears are destroyed.
-0.15 Shot Speed Down.

Anemic.name: Anemic
description: +5 Range Up.
When Isaac takes damage, he will start to leave a trail of blood creep behind him as he walks for the current room.
Lazarus' revived form (Lazarus II) respawns with this item.

Goat Head.name: Goat Head
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest, Golden Chest
description: Gives Isaac a guaranteed devil or angel room on every floor they can appear, even if you have already beaten the boss and it didn't show up originally.
Taking the Goat Head (or any other item) in a Devil Deal bars you from encountering Angel Rooms naturally. After which, the only way to access an Angel Room is via the Sacrifice Room.

Ceremonial Robes.name: Ceremonial Robes
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar
description: +3 Black Hearts.
+1 Damage Up.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.

Mom's Wig.name: Mom's Wig
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Challenge Room
description: Isaac now has a chance to create friendly attack spiders everytime he fires a tear.
Can create up to a maximum of 5 spiders in the room at one time.
The Hive Mind item allows Mom's Wig to spawn a maximum of 10 spiders at once instead of 5.
The chance to create a spider is affected by your luck stat and at +10 Luck it will activate every time.
Heals you for 1 red heart when picked up.

Placenta.name: Placenta
description: +1 Health Up.
Gives the player health regeneration over time.
It's possible to find this item by blowing up Polyps (the weird red rocks found in the Womb floors)

Old Bandage.name: Old Bandage
description: +1 Health Up.
The given heart container is empty.
When you get hit, you will sometimes cause hearts to drop on the floor.

Sad Bombs.name: Sad Bombs
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Bomb Beggar
description: +5 Bombs
Everytime a bomb explodes, it will release a circle of tears outwards, much like the Tammy's Head effect.
The tears from each bomb are affected by any tear modifiers Isaac has on his own tears.
The tears caused by Sad Bombs are much larger and do a lot more damage than Isaac's normal tears.

Rubber Cement.name: Rubber Cement
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
Rubber Cement.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Mom's heart 2 times.
description: Isaac's tears now bounce off walls and objects in the environment, such as rocks and pots.
Allows tears to hit the same enemy multiple times.
If you also have Lost Contact, tears will bounce off enemy projectiles instead of being destroyed.

Anti-Gravity.name: Anti-Gravity
description: -2 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
As you hold down the fire button, shots will float in the same place until you release the fire key again.
Allows you to store up a lot of tears in the air and release them all at once.
When the tears are released, they will fire off in the direction that Isaac was originally facing when it was created.

Pyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
description: +5 Bombs
All explosions now heal Isaac for 1 heart instead of hurting him.
Isaac will also be healed by other sources such as Mom's leg stomp, Satan's leg stomp.

Cricket's Body.name: Cricket's Body
description: -1 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
-10.0 Range Down.
Makes tears break into 4 smaller tears on impact with anything which deal half of your damage.

Gimpy.name: Gimpy
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar
description: When getting hit, this item has a chance to drop a soul heart or black heart.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
The chance to spawn a heart is affected by your luck stat and at +22 Luck it will activate 50% of the time.

Due to a bug, if you have more than 22 luck, Gimpy won't drop
any Soul or Black hearts (This bug has been fixed in Afterbirth+).
Enemies have a chance to drop half a heart when killed.

Black Lotus.name: Black Lotus
description: +1 Health Up.
+1 Soul Heart.
+1 Black Heart.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
An item only found in the secret room pool.

Piggy Bank.name: Piggy Bank
description: +3 Coins when picked up.
When you take damage, 1 or 2 coins will drop on the floor.
When playing as the Keeper, this item drops 0-1 coins instead.

Mom's Perfume:.name: Mom's Perfume:
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Challenge Room
description: -1 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
Isaac's tears have a 15% chance of causing a fear effect.
Feared enemies will run away from Isaac temporarily.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +85 Luck it will activate every time.

Monstro's Lung.name: Monstro's Lung
description: Tears can now be charged and released in a shotgun style effect, much like Monstro's main attack.

Abaddon.name: Abaddon
Abaddon.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Azazel.
description: On pickup removes all of your red hearts and gives you 6 black hearts.
+1.5 Damage Up.
+0.2 Speed Up.
Tears now have a chance to induce the fear effect, causing enemies to run away from Isaac for a short period.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +85 Luck it will activate every time.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.

Ball of Tar.name: Ball of Tar
description: Isaac leaves a trail of tar behind him which will slow down enemies that walk over it.
Tears have a chance to slow enemies and their projectiles for a short period of time.
The chance to slow enemies can improve based on your luck stat and will always slow enemies at +18 Luck.

Stop Watch.name: Stop Watch
Stop Watch.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by donating 999 pennies to the Shop.
description: +0.3 Speed Up.
After you get hit the Stop Watch applies a slowing effect for the rest of the room to all enemies and their projectiles.
The effect will still activate when hit while the Holy Mantle effect is active.
The slowing effect has a reduced effect against Brimstone lasers fired by enemies.

Tiny Planet.name: Tiny Planet
description: +7.0 Tear Height.
Tears now revolve around Isaac's Body at a fixed distance until they hit the ground.
Aiming in the opposite direction is often better due to how the tears circle around Isaac.

Causes a lot of great synergies with items such as Lump of Coal,
Brimstone, Rubber Cement, Technology and most of the worm trinkets.

Infestation 2.name: Infestation 2
description: Creates 1-2 friendly spiders when you kill an enemy.
Spiders are spawned at the location where the enemy died.

E. Coli.name: E. Coli
description: E. Coli turns normal enemies into poop if they touch you.
Enemies can turn into poop even if they do not do contact damage, allowing you to apply the effect without taking damage.
Can be combined with Midas Touch to turn enemies into Golden Poop.
This does not work on mini-bosses and bosses.

Death's Touch.name: Death's Touch
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
Death's Touch.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #17 (Waka Waka).
description: +1.5 Damage Up.
-0.3 Tears Down.
Isaac's tears turn into large scythes that penetrate through enemies (Similar to how Death's scythes look).

Key Piece #1.name: Key Piece #1
description: Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details.
First half of the key required to enter the door to the Mega Satan boss.
Drops from one of the angels which appear by bombing the statue in an angel room.

Key Piece #2.name: Key Piece #2
description: Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details.
Second half of the key required to enter the door to the Mega Satan boss.
Drops from one of the angels which appear by bombing the statue in an angel room.

Experimental Treatment.name: Experimental Treatment
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Boss Room, Demon Beggar
Experimental Treatment.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 7 times.
description: When picked up, this item will increase or decrease each one of your stats by a random amount.

The flavour text for this item is slightly misleading, it is
not an all stats up, however will average out as a slight increase
overall.
All 6 stats are affected by this item, including shot speed and luck.
At least one stat is reduced but no more than 3 stats are reduced.
Can kill Blue Baby if it removes health, but not other characters (This exception has been fixed for Afterbirth+).

Contract From Below.name: Contract From Below
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar
description: Doubles your pickup drops including chests, soul hearts and all other consumables which spawn at the end of a room.

Infamy.name: Infamy
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Gold Chest, Secret Room
description: Puts a shield on Isaac's face making it so he has a high chance to not take damage to projectiles from any direction.

Trinity Shield.name: Trinity Shield
description: Puts a shield in front of Isaac which blocks projectiles.
The shield will rotate based on the direction in which Isaac is firing tears.

Tech.5.name: Tech.5
Tech.5.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #18 (The Host).
description: Gives Isaac a laser which is positioned in the centre of his head and will fire at random intervals while firing tears.
Each laser does damage equal to your current tear damage.
The laser will occasionally fire with one of these effects: Hook Worm, Spoon Bender or Tiny Planet.
Luck has no effect on the rate at which Tech.5 fires and does not scale with items that increase your tears stat.
Isaac now shoots from both eyes at the same time.

Unlike the Inner Eye and Mutant Spider items, this double shot
item does not give a tears down, effectively giving you double damage
per second potential.

Blue Map.name: Blue Map
meta: Item Pool: Shop, Beggar, Key Beggar
Blue Map.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by donating 10 pennies to the Shop.
description: Reveals the locations of the secret and super secret room for the current floor and all future floors.

BFFS!.name: BFFS!
description: Makes all of Isaac's familiars much bigger, making them deal more damage.
Causes all familiars to deal double damage (x2 / +100%).
Has no effect on Rotten Baby, which instead benefits from Hive Mind.

Hive Mind.name: Hive Mind
description: Causes your friendly blue spiders and flies to become bigger and do 2x more damage.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
Allows Mom's Wig to spawn a maximum of 10 spiders at once instead of 5.

There's Options.name: There's Options
There's Options.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by donating 50 pennies to the Shop.
description: Two items now spawn after beating a boss fight and the boss rush, however only one can be taken and the other will disappear.
The additional item will always pick from the Boss Item Pool.
Appears in the shop item pool.
Does nothing after the Krampus fight.
Unlocked by donating to the donation machine in the shop.

Bogo Bombs.name: Bogo Bombs
description: All bomb pickups are now 1+1 bombs.
An item only found in the Shop item pool.

Starter Deck.name: Starter Deck
description: Isaac can now hold 2 tarot cards at once.
All future pill drops (including Mom's Coin Purse) will now instead become Tarot card drops.
An item only available in the Shop room.

Little Baggy.name: Little Baggy
Little Baggy.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by picking up 2 of the following items: Roid Rage, The Virus, Growth Hormones, Experimental Treatment or Speed Ball.
description: Allows for 2 pills to be held. Tap the drop button to cycle between each one
Drops a pill on the floor when picked up.
Changes all card and rune drops into pills. Any Tarot card or rune on the floor or current held when picking this item up will change into a pill.
Dice Shard counts as a card and will be converted.

Magic Scab.name: Magic Scab
description: +1 Health Up.
+1.0 Luck Up.

Blood Clot.name: Blood Clot
description: +1.0 Damage Up (Left eye only).
+5 Range Up (Left eye only).

The above stats only apply to tears fired from Isaac's left eye
 or with a 50% chance if you have an item which causes you to fire from a
 single source only.

Screw.name: Screw
description: +0.5 Tears Up
+0.2 Shot Speed Up

Hot Bombs.name: Hot Bombs
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Bomb Beggar
description: +5 Bombs
Gives all bombs a burning effect when they explode, leaving fire on the floor which deals 22 damage to enemies.

Fire Mind.name: Fire Mind
description: Isaac's tears now set enemies on fire, leaving a damage over time effect that does 4 or 6 damage per tick.
There is a chance that tears that hit enemies will explode, leaving a small fire on the floor that damages enemies.
Exploding tears deal damage * 2 + 22.
The chance for tears to explode is affected by your luck stat and at +13 Luck it will activate every time.

Missing No..name: Missing No.
Missing No..unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Boss Rush with Lazarus.
description:
At the start of each floor this item rerolls all your current
items, giving you a new item to over-ride each of the one you had.
A reference to the infamous 'Missingno' glitch from Pokemon.

Dark Matter.name: Dark Matter
description: Tears now have a chance to apply the fear effect to enemies, which causes them to run away from Isaac.
+1.0 Damage Up.
Reduced tear size.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +20 Luck it will activate every time.
An item only found in the devil room pool (Note: The Fallen boss pulls items from the Devil Room Pool)

Black Candle.name: Black Candle
Black Candle.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by donating 150 pennies to the Shop.
description: +1 Black Heart.
Immunity to all floor curses (e.g. Curse of the Lost)
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
An item that can appear in the shop room or in a Curse Room.
Black Candle removes the teleportation effect of Cursed Eye, and the Curse of the Tower's bomb spawning effect.
+30% Higher chance of a Devil Deal opening after the boss fight.

Proptosis.name: Proptosis
description: Gives Isaac high damage tears with a short range.
Tear size and damage falls off very fast with this item, the further the tear travels the less damage it does.
Tear damage starts at double (+100%) and decreases over range to roughly (+30%).

Despite the very small tears visually, Proptosis is always a
damage up at any range for tears. However with lasers such as Brimstone
this point is no longer true.

Missing Page 2.name: Missing Page 2
meta: Item Pool: Devil Room, Demon Beggar, Secret Room
description: +1 Black Heart.

Upon taking damage, if the total sum of Isaac's red hearts +
soul hearts is under one and a half hearts, the necronomicon effect will
 activate, dealing 40 damage to the entire room.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.

Smart Fly.name: Smart Fly
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Key Beggar
description: A yellow orbital fly that will block shots and when Isaac gets hit, will seek out the nearest enemy and attack it.

If the fly is in its attacking state and there are no longer
any enemies in range, it will return to Isaac and go back to being a
defensive orbital.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.

Dry Baby.name: Dry Baby
description: A familiar that follows Isaac and blocks any shots that hit it.

If a projectile is blocked by Dry Baby, he has a high chance to
 activate the Necronomicon effect, dealing 40 damage to the entire room.
The chance to activate the effect is not changed by your Luck stat.
Can drop while destroying skulls in the Depths and Necropolis floors.

Juicy Sack.name: Juicy Sack
description: A familiar that follows isaac around dropping white creep which slows down enemies that walk over it.
Spawns a familiar blue spider sometimes when you finish a room.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.

Robo-Baby 2.0.name: Robo-Baby 2.0
Robo-Baby 2.0.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #16 (Computer Savvy).
description: A familiar that is controlled via the arrow keys and will automatically fire a laser if anything is in its line of sight.
Robo-Baby 2.0's lasers deal 3.5 damage per hit.

Rotten Baby.name: Rotten Baby
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
description: A familiar which follows Isaac and spawns a blue flies.
Rotten Baby can only create one fly at a time, meaning if he has created a fly he cannot make another until it is used.
Blue Flies do 2.0x of Isaac's damage.
The Hive Mind item will cause Rotten Baby's flies to deal double damage.

Headless Baby.name: Headless Baby
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
description: A familiar that follows Isaac and leaves blood creep on the floor as it floats, hurting enemies that walk over it.

Leech.name: Leech
description: Spawns a familiar leech on the ground that hunts down enemies and heals you for half a heart each time it eats one.
The Leech deals 1.5 contact damage per tick.

Mystery Sack.name: Mystery Sack
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Beggar, Secret Room
Mystery Sack.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Eden.
description: A bag that follows Isaac and drops a random pickup every few rooms (Fixed in patch v1.04).
Can drop any kind of heart, coin, bomb or key.

BBF.name: BBF
description: A large familiar black fly that bounces around the room, exploding on contact with enemies dealing 70 damage.
Does not explode if it hits Isaac, however if it explodes on an enemy while Isaac is in range, he will take damage.
Respawns after 10 seconds or by moving to another room.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.

Bob's Brain.name: Bob's Brain
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Gold Chest
description:
A green brain that launches in the direction you are firing
your tears and will explode on contact with enemies, dealing damage and
poisoning anything in the blast radius.
Bob's Brain deals 60 damage and applies a poison damage over time effect, which will scale with damage upgrades.
Regenerates over time.
Will hurt Isaac if he is in the blast radius.

Best Bud.name: Best Bud
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Key Beggar
description: When Isaac takes damage, a white attack fly will spawn that orbits him at a similar distance to the Distant Admiration fly.
The fly orbits a lot faster than Distant Admiration or Forever Alone and deals 5 damage per tick.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.

Lil Brimstone.name: Lil Brimstone
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
description: A familiar that follows Isaac and can fire up and charge brimstone shots, exactly how the normal Brimstone item works but with less damage.
A fully charged laser deals 31.5 damage.
A familiar found in the devil room.

Isaac's Heart.name: Isaac's Heart
Isaac's Heart.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with The Lost.
description:
Prevents Isaac from taking any damage, but instead summons a
familiar heart that follows you around. If the heart is hit, Isaac will
take damage.
Sharp Plug becomes useless with this item, due to how damage is prevented on Isaac's body.

Lil Haunt.name: Lil Haunt
description:
A familiar ghost that follows Isaac around and chases enemies
close-by, damaging them for 2 contact damage and causing a fear effect.

Dark Bum.name: Dark Bum
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room
description:
A familiar beggar similar to Bum Friend that follows Isaac and
collects red hearts, giving Isaac soul hearts or spiders in return.
Soul hearts are the most common payout with only a small chance to spawn friendly or hostile spiders.
Dark Bum has a small chance to give a black heart instead of a soul heart.
For every 1.5 red hearts he takes, he will give 1 heart/spider in return.

Big Fan.name: Big Fan
description: A very large orbital that moves around Isaac very slowly, blocking shots and dealing 2 contact damage per tick.

Affects the speed of all other orbitals, slowing them down a
lot (NOTE: This effect does not happen until you get a new orbital after
 Big Fan).
Does not count as one of your three standard orbitals, allowing you to have a total of 4.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.

Sissy Long Legs.name: Sissy Long Legs
description: An adorable friendly blue spider that walks around the room laying other blue spiders which attack enemies.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.
She can only spawn a maximum of up to 5 spiders at a time and will only do so while there are enemies in the room.

Punching Bag.name: Punching Bag
description: Spawns a friendly Mulligan that walks around the room. Mulligan can be hit by enemy projectiles, making him a good shield.
Enemies will sometimes target the Mulligan if he is closer.

How To Jump.name: How To Jump
description: When used, makes Isaac leap in the air, similar to the leaper enemies.
Maintains momentum if you are already moving in the same direction.
If you already have an item which gives you flying, this item becomes a dash effect instead.
Can be used in the Isaac boss fight to jump over the beams of light he spawns.

D100.name: D100
D100.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Boss Rush with The Lost.
description:
When used, rerolls each item you currently own into another
item room pool item and any pedestal items and pickups in the room.
Has the combined uses of the D4, D6 and D20.

D4.name: D4
D4.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by blowing up 30 slot machines.
description: When used, the D4 re-rolls each item you currently have into another random item from the item room pool.

Each time an item is generated by the D4, it is also removed
from the pool. When the pool is empty, it will eventually re-roll all
your items into heart containers.
Cannot remove Azazel's Brimstone laser.

D10.name: D10
description: When used, rerolls all enemies in the room which are currently alive into another random type of enemy from any floor.
Dangerous to use in early floors, it could replace a basement enemy with something usually found in the Womb only.
Cannot reroll mini-bosses or bosses.

Blank Card.name: Blank Card
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Shop, Secret Room
Blank Card.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Eden.
description: When used, copies the effect of the tarot card you are currently holding without consuming it.
The Blank Card can also be used to mimic mystic runes as well as tarot cards.
An item that often appears in the shop.

Book of Secrets.name: Book of Secrets
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Library, Secret Room
Book of Secrets.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Eden.
description:
When used, you have a chance of getting one of the three
following effects: Treasure Map (floor layout), Compass (map icons) or
Blue Map (secret room locations)

Box of Spiders.name: Box of Spiders
description: When used, spawns 2-4 friendly blue spiders on the floor.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.

Red Candle.name: Red Candle
Red Candle.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by donating 400 pennies to the Shop.
description:
Allows you to fire a red flame infront of you, similar to the
Blue Candle item, however the flame will stay for the current room.
Each flame deals 125 total damage.
The flame will shrink in size when deals damage to something and eventually disappear.

The Jar.name: The Jar
description:
Isaac can now pick up hearts while at full health, which will
be stored in the Jar and can be spawned again using the spacebar.
Up to 4 hearts can be stored in The Jar.
Soul hearts and black hearts cannot be stored.
If used in a Black heart or Eternal heart super secret room, it will spawn the relevant heart.

FLUSH!.name: FLUSH!
description: When used, turns every normal enemy in the room into poop!
Does not work on mini-bosses and bosses.
Kills poop bosses when used.

The Satanic Bible.name: The Satanic Bible
meta: Item Pool: Item Room, Library, Devil Room
The Satanic Bible.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Azazel.
description: When used, gives Isaac +1 Black Heart.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.

Head of Krampus.name: Head of Krampus
Head of Krampus.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Krampus (Krampus is unlocked by taking 20 devil deal items).
description: When used, fires a 4 way brimstone laser in all cardinal directions, dealing a lot of damage to any enemies.
Maximum potential damage is 462 (20-21 ticks of 22 damage if the laser makes contact the whole duration)
Laser damage does not scale with your damage stat.
Has a chance to drop after you beat Krampus.
If you get close enough to an enemy that has a large hitbox, you can hit it with 2 of the laser beams, allowing you to deal a lot more damage.

Butter Bean.name: Butter Bean
Butter Bean.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by destroying 100 poops.
description: When used, farts on nearby enemies and knocks them backwards away from Isaac.
Allows you to reflect projectiles away from Isaac (Afterbirth only feature)

Magic Fingers.name: Magic Fingers
description: Upon use, consumes a coin and deals damage to everything in the room.
Damage dealt is equal to your tear damage * 2.

Converter.name: Converter
description: When used, converts 2 soul or black hearts into 1 red heart container.
This item will take from your soul hearts first.

Pandora's Box.name: Pandora's Box
Pandora's Box.unlock: UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Lazarus.
description: When used, this item will spawn a set of items or consumables based on which floor you are currently on.
Basement 1: 2 Soul hearts. Basement 2: 2 Bombs + 2 Keys.
Caves 1: 1 Boss Item. Caves 2: 1 Boss Item + 2 Soul Hearts.
Depths 1: 4 Soul hearts. Depths 2: 20 coins.
Womb 1: 2 Boss Items. Womb 2: Bible.
Blue Womb: Nothing!
Sheol: 1 Devil Room Item + 1 Black Heart. Cathedral: 1 Angel Room Item + 1 Eternal Heart.
Chest: 1 coin. Dark Room: Nothing!
The Void: Nothing!
Pandora's Box considers XL floors to always be the first floor of a chapter.

Unicorn Stump.name: Unicorn Stump
description: When used, turns Isaac invincible and gains +0.28 speed for a 5 seconds.
You cannot fire tears while the stump is active.
Very similar to the My Little Unicorn item but does not deal contact damage.

When used with Mom's Knife, you can still deal contact damage
but will be unable to change the way the knife faces while the effect is
 active.

Taurus.name: Taurus
description: -0.3 Speed Down.
While in a hostile room your speed raises at a rate of +0.065 per second.

When you hit a speed stat of 2.0, Isaac will gain the My Little
 Unicorn invincibility effect for a few seconds, increasing speed and
allowing him to run into enemies to deal 40 contact damage per hit.
The time it takes for the effect to activate becomes shorter with a higher base Speed stat.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.

Aries.name: Aries
description: +0.25 Speed up.
Gives huge horns which stick out, allowing you to deal 18 contact damage if you hit something with enough speed.
Will not deal contact damage unless you are moving fast enough, but does not prevent you from taking damage yourself.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.

Cancer.name: Cancer
description: +3 Soul Hearts
After getting hit once, you gain a damage reduction for the rest of the room similar to The Wafer item (-50% damage taken).
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.

Leo.name: Leo
description: Isaac gets a lion's mane and now has the ability to crush rocks by walking over them.
Crushed rocks and poop can fill holes if you walk in their direction.
Allows you to crush Red Poops and sometimes not take damage. However, If you also have flying you will always take damage.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.

Virgo.name: Virgo
description:
A random chance when you take damage to get an invincibility
shield for a few seconds (Similar to the Celtic Cross effect but more
likely).

The chance to get an invincibility shield is affected by your
